channel.title: SCBC TV
channel.description: SCBC TV, founded in 2017, emerged as the communication conduit for the Southern Cameroons Ambazonia struggle. Its primary mission is twofold: to amplify our voice and to enlighten not only our fellow compatriots but also the global community about our ongoing seven-year struggle.
